intent_data.goal: Make all required fields editable in the admin panel, remove default required status for make, brand, model, and age fields, and ensure pricing is editable at unit level (per appliance, per boiler) and at total level. Fix authentication persistence for hosted environment and ensure number input arrows work properly.

requirements.description: Remove make, brand, model, and age as required fields by default
Make pricing editable at per-appliance level
Make pricing editable at per-boiler level
Ensure total pricing is editable and working correctly
Fix number input arrows and editability
Change auth persistence from LOCAL to SESSION

routing_decision.reason: Simple enhancement task with clear requirements, low complexity score (36/100), minimal file changes needed

foundation_components.baseline_intent: Make all required fields editable in the admin panel, remove default required status for make, brand, model, and age fields, and ensure pricing is editable at unit level (per appliance, per boiler) and at total level. Fix authentication persistence for hosted environment and ensure number input arrows work properly.
